name: PopGroup Lite
description:
PopGroup is a polished version of the classic "samegame" concept invented in 1985 by Kuniaki Moribe.

Just pop groups of bubbles that have the same color. Sound easy? It is, unless you want a high score! You have to pop groups in the right order to form bigger groups and get more points.

Compare PopGroup to other games based on the same concept:
- Crystal-clear graphics
- Animations
- Customizable width, height, and number of bubble colors
- Online high scores
- No in-app ads or in-app purchases!

PopGroup is made by the developer of tChess (the popular iOS chess app), and Learn Chess (the Apple Staff Favorite e-book).
